minReadySeconds.description: Minimum number of seconds for which a newly created pod should be ready without any of its container crashing, for it to be considered available. Default valuee 0 means pods will be considered available as soon as they are ready

replicas.description: The number of desired replicas. This is a pointer to distinguish between explicit zero and unspecified.

selector.description: A label query over pods that should match the replica count. Label keys and values that must match in order to be controlled by this replica set. It must match the pod template's labels. Empty selector is invalid.

template.description: The object that describes the pod that will be created if insufficient replicas are detected.
